Introduction

Jin Dozin, formerly known as Seoli and Daya, is a South Korean singer.

She is a member of the girl group Ferry Blue and a former member of the girl group Blue Fox, with the name of Daya, and BaBa, with the name of Seoli.

She made her solo debut on December 17, 2019.
